name: Perfect Lyre
description:
You are a (particularly) superb lyrebird, rainforest-dweller and mimic extraordinaire. Your mission in life is to make your song as complex and beautiful as possible by collecting as many sounds to mimic as you can. And today is a good day, because two humans have stopped near your tree - and humans bring with them the most fascinating collection of sounds.

A very tiny text-based game made in a few days for the Australian Bushfire Charity Jam.
